headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://api.stripe.com https://m.stripe.network https://q.stripe.com; frame-src https://js.stripe.com https://hooks.stripe.com; script-src 'self' https://js.stripe.com 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self' data:; worker-src 'self' blob:
